about.description:
Google Cloud Dataproc API client library manages Hadoop-based clusters and jobs on Google Cloud Platform. With Dataproc, enterprises get a fully managed, purpose-built cluster that can autoscale to support any data or analytics processing job.
See the [quick start guide](https://googleapis.dev/python/dataproc/latest/index.html#quick-start).
about.summary: Google Cloud Dataproc API client library

about.description:
Google Cloud Dataproc API client library manages Hadoop-based clusters and jobs on Google Cloud Platform. With Dataproc, enterprises get a fully managed, purpose-built cluster that can autoscale to support any data or analytics processing job.
See the [quick start guide](https://googleapis.dev/python/dataproc/latest/index.html#quick-start).
about.summary: Google Cloud Dataproc API client library

name: google-cloud-dataproc
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "google-cloud-dataproc" %}
{% set version = "5.16.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name.replace('-', '_') }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 23b2d8ae4f648e01b66fed0abea114b600d3363d955b8558c7645a93f28d6e3c

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - google-api-core >=1.34.1,<3.0.0dev,!=2.0.*,!=2.1.*,!=2.2.*,!=2.3.*,!=2.4.*,!=2.5.*,!=2.6.*,!=2.7.*,!=2.8.*,!=2.9.*,!=2.10.*
    - google-api-core-grpc
    - google-auth >=2.14.1,<3.0.0dev,!=2.24.0,!=2.25.0
    # more restrictive version for python 3.13
    - proto-plus >=1.25.0,<2.0.0dev
    - protobuf >=3.20.2,<6.0.0dev,!=4.21.0,!=4.21.1,!=4.21.2,!=4.21.3,!=4.21.4,!=4.21.5
    - grpc-google-iam-v1 >=0.12.4,<1.0.0dev

test:
  imports:
    - google.cloud.dataproc
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/googleapis/google-cloud-python/tree/main/packages/google-cloud-dataproc
  summary: Google Cloud Dataproc API client library
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: LICENSE
  description: "Google Cloud Dataproc API client library manages Hadoop-based clusters and jobs on Google Cloud Platform. With Dataproc, enterprises get a fully managed, purpose-built cluster that can autoscale to support any data or analytics processing job.\nSee the [quick start guide](https://googleapis.dev/python/dataproc/latest/index.html#quick-start)."

  doc_url: https://googleapis.dev/python/dataproc/latest/index.html
  dev_url: https://github.com/googleapis/google-cloud-python/tree/main/packages/google-cloud-dataproc

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - parthea
    - xylar
